extendedInfo.description: NEW TO GOOGLE PLAY!**Save 75% for a limited time!**â¢ Practice early math and science skills with your pals from Mickey Mouse Clubhouse!â¢ Count animals and help Mickey snap colorful photos!â¢ Match animals to their natural habitats to create a Wildlife Photo Album!Did someone say road trip? Join Mickey and the gang on a globe-trotting trip to Mickey Beach. As they travel through exciting environments, kids take pictures while counting groups of animals and learning about wildlife habitats. Early math concepts such as sequencing, more and less, sorting, and numeral matching are also reinforced through play-along games and interactivity. With a rich variety of early math and science activities, children will delight in learning alongside Mickey and his Clubhouse pals.FEATURESâ¢ Hands-on activities help children practice early math and science skills.â¢ Word-by-word story text highlighting encourages pre-readers.â¢ Original animation and delightful sound bring the story to life.â¢ Easy-to-use navigation and game-play tools like tap, shake, and tilt.â¢ Story extension activities for parents and caregivers.If you are experiencing any technical issues, please don't hesitate to contact customer care at 877-662-3769 or memberservices@disneydigitalbooks.com.

reviews.title: Okay
reviews.comment: Its short but I believe its worth 99\342\202\254 for my 3 year old. She loved it.  You can not beat it for the price they have it at not. 75% off
reviews.author: Rose Marie Rodriguez
